title: World is moving into the Indian era: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff
description: India not only performs engineering and support functions for the company, but large Indian customers have seen significant success on the Salesforce platform, Marc Benioff told us.
content: The world is moving into "the Indian era" and the country presents exciting opportunities, said Marc Benioff, chief executive of cloud-based software company Salesforce.“There is no question that we are going to move into an incredible moment in India. And you know it’s a very exciting opportunity, we have invested very aggressively in India,” Benioff said.India not only performs engineering and support functions for the company, but large Indian customers have seen significant success on the Salesforce platform, he said.Benioff was speaking to the media at the company’s 22nd annual conference, Dreamforce, in San Francisco, where the company is headquartered.While Indian IT services firms are increasingly partnering with Salesforce to build capabilities and solutions, Benioff said employees of companies such as Accenture, IBM, Capgemini, Deloitte and KPMG are Salesforce “trailblazers”.
